titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that Donald Stratton be remembered for a lifetime of heroism and service to the United States.
A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that Donald Stratton be remembered for a lifetime of heroism and service to the United States.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: This resolution honors Donald Stratton for his lifelong commitment to service to the country and remembers the men and women of the Greatest Generation.
